channel.title: humournothumour on Alex Ptakhin
channel.description: Recent content in humournothumour on Alex Ptakhin

item.title: Art of Being Busy
item.description: I’m sure busy calendars open vast opportunities to choose one things over the others. The more people in our department, the busier our calendar, the more valuable we are in terms of power to the company. It’s inappropriate if anyone can see our free calendar and book a meeting for us to discuss something urgent. 15 minutes on Tuesday at 7:45 p.m. in two weeks sounds fine. It’s easier to add more processes.
